      • parseOption

        static int parseOption​(java.util.Scanner keyboard)
        This function handles taking in an integer between 1 and 8 from the user and pass it back to the menu function
        Parameters:
        keyboard - : import scanner to not generate new one
        Returns:
        option : the option integer is sued by menu to decide which function the user wishes to run

        This function adds a phone object to the menu's product database

        keyboard - : import scanner to not generate new one
        database - : the product database that menu is working on
